articles.title: Bill Belichick explains ‘simple’ reason why he decided to ban Patriots scout at UNC
articles.description:
“It’s clear that I’m not welcome there around their facility, so they're not welcome at ours."

The post Bill Belichick explains ‘simple’ reason why he decided to ban Patriots scout at UNC appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bill Belichick banned a Patriots scout from UNC due to mutual unwelcomeness.
Belichick stated, 'I’m not welcome there around their facility,' indicating ongoing tensions.
This decision may affect future scouting opportunities for the Patriots in North Carolina.
